citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1pm on 14-MARCH-
2023.
Called the licensee's cell phone. There was no answer so a voicemail was left. A text message was sent to the licensee's
cell number after the phone call. Inspectors waited an additional 30 minutes after leaving messages. After 30 minutes,
inspectors knocked on the licensee's front door. The licensee's wife answered the door and stated that the licensee was
not home. She was not sure when the licensee would be home.
Additional Inspectors:
CARRIE BONGARD, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Critical Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1pm on 14-MARCH-
2023. 
Called the licensee's cell phone. There was no answer so a voicemail was left. A text message was sent to the licensee's 
cell number after the phone call. Inspectors waited an additional 30 minutes after leaving messages. After 30 minutes, 
inspectors knocked on the licensee's front door. The licensee's wife answered the door and stated that the licensee was 
not home. She was not sure when the licensee would be home. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
CARRIE BONGARD, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
